lead_paragraph: LeBron James and Kevin Love picked up much of the slack with Kyrie Irving sidelined by a hamstring injury. They got some help, too.
snippet: LeBron James and Kevin Love picked up much of the slack with Kyrie Irving sidelined by a hamstring injury. They got some help, too....

headline.main: James, Love Help Cavs End 2016 With 121-109 Win Over Hornets
headline.print_headline: James, Love Help Cavs End 2016 With 121-109 Win Over Hornets
